purpose: To create and explore procedurally generated virtual worlds for research and entertainment
principle: Utilizes generative algorithms and procedural generation techniques to create expansive and dynamic virtual environments
reusability: Offers API and plugin support for integration into game engines and virtual reality platforms
limitations: Limited to predefined algorithms for world generation, may require significant computational resources for large-scale environments
name: genex
highlight: Explores and generates virtual worlds using advanced generative algorithms
